H0.text: Which American band had a 1970’s UK hit with ‘Let’s Work Together’. The Doors

H1.text: Which American band had a 1970’s UK hit with ‘Let’s Work Together’. Lynyrd Skynyrd

H2.text: Which American band had a 1970’s UK hit with ‘Let’s Work Together’. The Eagles

H3.text: Which American band had a 1970’s UK hit with ‘Let’s Work Together’. Canned Heat

A4.text: Canned Heat had a big hit with 'Let's Work Together' and was the band's only top forty hit to feature the vocals of Bob 'The Bear' Hite.

A5.text: 'Let's Work Together', a Wilbert Harrison song, was the single chosen for release in Europe to coincide with the tour.
